parameters.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Type of the content being sent

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand

lastModified.description: When the Benefit was last modified

daysAgoOfPurchases.description: Number of days that are considered to add the purchase history

isActive.description: Field that actives or deactivates the benefit

isArchived.description: Field that archive or unarchive the benefit

isFeatured.description: Define if the promotion is featured. A featured benefit has a flag in the product that indicates the benefit

activeDaysOfWeek.description: Define which days of the week the benefit will applied

cumulative.description: Define if a benefit can accumulate with another benefit

nominalShippingDiscountValue.description: Define the nominal Shipping Discount Value

absoluteShippingDiscountValue.description: Define the absolute Shipping Discount Value

maximumUnitPriceDiscount.description: Define the maximum Unit Price Discount

percentualShippingDiscountValue.description: Define the Percentual Shipping Discount Value

percentualTax.description: Percentual Tax over purchase total value

shippingPercentualTax.description: Shipping Percentual Tax over purchase total value

percentualDiscountValueList1.description: Define the valid discounts for the SKUs in `listSku1BuyTogether`, discount list used for Buy Together Promotions

nominalRewardValue.description: Define Nominal Reward Value that client will receive. Used for benefits type miles or benefits clubs

percentualRewardValue.description: Define Percentual Reward Value that client will receive. Used for benefits type miles or benefits clubs

orderStatusRewardValue.description: Define the order status reward value

maxNumberOfAffectedItems.description: Define the max number of affected items for a benefit

origin.description: Define the origin of the benefit, Marketplace or Seller

idSellerIsInclusive.description: Define if at least one of the sellers must be valid to active the promotion

idsSalesChannel.description: Define the Sales Channels (Trade Policys) that active the benefit

paymentsMethods.description: Object compose by all the Payments Methods

campaigns.description: Define the campaigns for the benefit

categories.description: Object compose by the categories that will active or deactivate the benefit

categoriesAreInclusive.description: Set if the categories field will active or deactive the benefit

brands.description: Object compose by the brands that will active or deactivate the benefit

brandsAreInclusive.description: Set if the brands field will active or deactivate the benefit

products.description: Object compose by the products that will active or deactivate the benefit

productsAreInclusive.description: Set if the products field will active or deactivate the benefit

collections1BuyTogether.description: Define the collections that will generate the benefit, type Buy Together, More for less, Progressive Discount, Buy One Get One

minimumQuantityBuyTogether.description: Define the minimum quantity for Buy Together benefit

quantityToAffectBuyTogether.description: Define the quantity to affect buy Together Benefit

listSku1BuyTogether.description: SKU first list for the promotion Buy Together

listSku2BuyTogether.description: SKU second list for the promotion Buy Together

totalValueFloor.description: Minimum chart value to activate the promotion

totalValueCeling.description: Maximum chart value to activate the promotion

totalValueMode.description: Define if products that already are  receiving a promotion, will be considered on the chart total value. There are three options available: IncludeMatchedItems, ExcludeMatchedItems, AllItems

collections.description: Object compose by the collections that will active or deactivate the benefit

collectionsIsInclusive.description: Set if the collections field will active or deactivate the benefit

restrictionsBins.description: Define credit card Bins that actives the promotion

totalValuePurchase.description: Define total valeu a client must have in past orders to active the promotion

isSlaSelected.description: Apply selected discount only when one of the defined shipping method is selected by the customer

isFirstBuy.description: Apply the discount only if it's a first buy

firstBuyIsProfileOptimistic.description: Apply the discount even if the user is not logged

isDifferentListPriceAndPrice.description: Apply the benefit only if the list price and price is different

zipCodeRanges.description: Define what is the range of the ZipCode that applies the benefit

isMinMaxInstallments.description: Set if the benefits will be applied considering a minimum and maximum values for installments

clusterExpressions.description: Define an expression to use with clusters

maxUsage.description: Define how many times the benefit can be used

maxUsagePerClient.description: Define how many times the benefit can be used per client

multipleUsePerClient.description: Define if the benefit can be used multiple times per client

type.description: Define what is the type of the benefit

isArchived.description: Field that archive or unarchive a Coupon

maxItemsPerClient.description: The customer may purchase up a number of products, using this coupon in one or more purchases

expirationIntervalPerUse.description: Renew each coupon usage after a number of days

maxItemsPerClient.description: The customer may purchase up a number of products, using this coupon in one or more purchases

expirationIntervalPerUse.description: Renew each coupon usage after a number of days

tags.name: Prices (legacy - v1)
tags.description:
> NOTE: If your account is using Pricing v2, you should avoid using these routes. Please refer directly to the [Pricing v2 API](https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/101975/vtex-pricing-api/6YsWxKT) 
> If you are still using Pricing v1, please [check if your store is able to migrate to take advantage of many more features](https://help.vtex.com/en/faq/how-to-migrate-a-store-to-pricing-v2)
